title: Arrival at Walston
atmosphere: Modest frontier port. Functional rather than impressive. Locals in traditional kilts going about their business.
description: The Travellers arrive at Walston after weeks of travel. First impressions of this backwater world and its people.

triggers.exit: Travellers proceed to government building or Startown

first_observations: Small port - barely more than a landing field with prefab buildings
Locals wear traditional kilts, seem content
Thin atmosphere - not dangerous but noticeable
Mix of humans and Vargr, though Vargr seem to hold service positions
narrator_prompt: The far trader Autumn Gold settles onto the landing pad with a familiar shudder. Through the viewports, Walston stretches out - brown and grey beneath a thin atmosphere. The starport is modest, almost rustic. A few prefab buildings, a fuel depot, not much else. Locals in traditional kilts go about their business, paying the arriving ship little mind. This is a quiet world. What could possibly go wrong?
